dmca.title: Notice of Claimed Infringement: http://www.stormfront.org
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Arien [mailto:arien@puertasdebabel.com] 
Posted At: Saturday, October 21, 2006 5:29 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Notice of Claimed Infringement: http://www.stormfront.org
Subject: Notice of Claimed Infringement: http://www.stormfront.org



To whom it may concern:

Your company hosts a website located at http://www.stormfront.org/
containing graphics and text copyrighted to and owned by me as the
creator of Site Name located at http://www.puertasdebabel.com/wicca/
The infringing content can be seen at
http://www.stormfront.org/forum/showthread.php?t=335257 and include

*        the graphic on post #1 
*        the totality of posts #6 to #17,  both text, graphics and
photographs


I very specifically state on every page of my site site that contents,
graphics and photographs are not public domain, are copyrighted by me
and cannot be published anywhere without my written permission.
Permission was not granted. Therefore, the use of my graphics and text
on the web page hosted at your site is illegal under copyright law and
forbidden under my terms of use.
 
I am prepared to sign and fax to you a prepared statement of ownership
indicating that the information provided by me, Ana Winson, is accurate
and *under penalty of perjury* I state that I have exclusive rights to
the material in question. I am legally authorized and represent myself,
as I am the licensed owner of the copyrighted material. 

In reviewing your site's terms of service, you indicate the following
regarding copyright violations: 

" Customers may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host,
or otherwise store on a Server any information, data, material, or work
that infringes the intellectual property rights of others. The Planet
has the right to disable access to, or remove, infringing content to the
extent required under any law or regulation, including the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998." 

Therefore, I am seeking your immediate intercession with this matter. 

Please remedy this offence with either: 

(1) Your immediate contact with the site owner demanding the prompt
removal of both graphics and text owned by and copyrighted to me or (2)
that you remove the site itself and/or my files from your server. 

Your expeditious attention to this matter is greatly appreciated as I
find no other recourse for remedy without undertaking legal action. 

Please understand that this letter is not a warning or threat. It is
being sent to you as part of a legal process that must be followed in an
effort to maintain my legal rights. You can put an immediate stop to
this process by acting in accordance with this offer of good faith. 

Sincerely, 

/Ana Winson/
Ana Winson
Las Puertas de Babel 
Reply to: arien <mailto:arien@puertasdebabel.com> @puertasdebabel.com 
http://www.puertasdebabel.com <http://www.puertasdebabel.com>
